text:
- Pop Family Entertainment
is a multi genre
content production company.
As soon as you say, film and 3D,

there's an incredible
amount of computing power
to render that.

And we made a decision
to do all the animation
and all the rendering and all the lighting
down in Australia.
So once we'd made that decision,

we needed some heavy
computing power to help us.

So we heard about a new
service that AWS has
called Amazon Nimble Studio.
It enables us to bring onboard new artists

in a couple of hours as
opposed to a couple of weeks.

And so, it really gets people
working quicker and faster.
Nimble enabled us to be able to go

and get talent from people
that are not necessarily
living right in the center of Sydney.
And that's an important thing

because it means that artists
can go and have a life

outside of Sydney, which
is cheaper, nicer beaches,
all the rest of that,

and still have a creative
career that is fulfilling
and professional for their entire life.
By using Amazon Nimble Studio,
we've been able to realize a dream

of actually making a 3D
animated feature film

all in Australia at a
relatively low budget price.
(upbeat music)
